title: Selena Gomez Wore a "Non-Toxic" Sweatshirt on TikTok and I, For One, 100% Stan This Energy
author: Kelsey Stiegman
description: Yep, and you can shop it for $58.
cleaned_text: on TikTok and I, For One, 100% Stan This Energy Selena Gomez is going TikTok-viral in a "NON-TOXIC" hoodie from Petals and Peacocks. To answer your next question: yes, it's still shoppable online for only $58. What energy are we taking into 2020? [Insert Meryl Streep meme] NON-TOXIC ENERGY! Selena Gomez is repping that very statement in [her latest viral TikTok.](https://www.tiktok.com/@selenagomez/video/6801245317586078981) Like the rest of the internet, Selena has taken a stab at the sensational Say So dance. She teamed up with a really cute child to low-key rock out to Doja Cat's hit song. Yes, the dance was very cute, but what what we really care about is what Selena wore to do it. The pop star channeled 100% of my vibes in wide-leg jeans, thin gold hoops, and a crewneck emblazoned with the phrase "NON-TOXIC." Much like those healing crystals you've been hoarding, this topper is guaranteed to ward off all negativity. Petals and Peacocks, the brand responsible for this iconic sweatshirt, is an under-the-radar favorite of editors and celebs. They stock hype styles that would look right at home in [the closet of any VSCO girl](https://www.seventeen.com/fashion/trends/g29036093/vsco-girl-brands-starter-pack/) or e-boy. I'm talking: plush bucket hats, cow print button-ups, graphic scrunchies, and, yes, Selena's NON-TOXIC sweatshirt. At the moment, the exact style is still [fully stocked on their website](https://petalsandpeacocks.com/collections/sweatshirts/products/non-toxic-crewneck-in-black?variant=31810873917500) in sizes S up to XXL at the cool-cool cost of $58.
